channel.title: No one can get on My server but me
channel.description: Every time I ask someone to join my server, they say, It's offline, but On my Cmd prompt thing, It says its online. This is really annoying.

item.title: No one can get on My server but me
item.dc:creator: @xurich xurich
item.description:
@xurich wrote:

[quote=“pl0xh34d, post:5, topic:222732”]dont turn ur firewall off just open the port on ur firewall and make sure u have ur port opened on ur network connection[/quote]Thank you, If I could rep you guys I would.

Read full topic
item.source: No one can get on My server but me

item.title: No one can get on My server but me
item.dc:creator: @pl0xh34d pl0xh34d
item.description:
@pl0xh34d wrote:

dont turn ur firewall off just open the port on ur firewall and make sure u have ur port opened on ur network connection

Read full topic
item.source: No one can get on My server but me

item.title: No one can get on My server but me
item.dc:creator: @xurich xurich
item.description:
@xurich wrote:

I did portforwad already, and my internet settings are low. Turning off firewall? Seriously?

Read full topic
item.source: No one can get on My server but me

item.title: No one can get on My server but me
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

port forward and put your internet settings on a lower setting turn off firewall

Read full topic
item.source: No one can get on My server but me

item.title: No one can get on My server but me
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Port forward. www.portforward.com -> Guides -> [ YOUR ROUTER ] -> click on Default guide -> follow it.

Read full topic
